eu_initiatives: To follow up current status of EU initiatives related with insurance industry (mainly focusing on consumer protection and financial stability)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
http://www.kiri.or.kr/ 
 
Our reports are available online to the public. Most of our reports are in Korean.
goals__remit: KIRI is an insurance industry think tank dedicated to promoting the sound development of Korean insurance industry and the advancement of Korean economy.
